title: Crypto Mile: Polygon co-founder on ambition to overtake Ethereum - Yahoo Finance UK
summary: Polygon, a layer two blockchain built on top of Ethereum, is set to overtake Ethereum in terms of economic activity, according to its co-founder Mihailo Bjelic. The upgrade, zkEVM, allows for high volumes of transactions at speed and low cost without sacrificing privacy and network security. Polygon has already seen mass adoption by big corporations and enterprises, including Telefónica, Reddit, Starbucks, and Instagram. The platform has committed $1 billion and raised $450 million to build zkEVM, and its native cryptocurrency, matic, has fallen 2.7% to $1.08.

title: Solana Options Protocol Cega Comes to Ethereum - Blockworks
summary: Cega Finance, a derivatives protocol, is launching on Ethereum mainnet after originating on Solana. Exotic options, which offer leveraged longs and shorts on an underlying asset with specific investment goals, will be available. These options include barrier options and Asian options, which provide a payoff depending on the average price of the asset over time. Cega's protocol also supports structured vault products, which enable yields during volatile market environments. The protocol will offer a leveraged options vault (LOV) strategy, which is capital efficient and allows for leveraged returns without additional liquidity. LOV liquidations work by requiring collateral if the underlying asset drops by over 50% during a set time period. Cega is also launching a trading firm, Tras Mobian, to resolve one-sided demand issues in decentralized financial markets.

title: Cega launches on Ethereum, introduces new leveraged options product, and launches trading firm - Business Wire
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Cega, a leading derivatives protocol in DeFi, has launched on Ethereum Mainnet, offering exotic options structured product vaults with up to 5x higher yields. The platform has also launched a trading firm, Tras Mobian, to provide competitive liquidity and conduct research and development for new products. Cega's smart contracts have been double audited for security and the platform offers principal protection and up to 109% APY yields. The LOV (Leveraged Option Vault) strategy is expected to launch within Q2 and will offer up to 5x higher yields without the need for additional collateralization. Cega is committed to pushing the boundaries of DeFi innovation and empowering users to take control of their financial futures.

title: Ethereum Rival Cardano Set To Plunge 70% Against Bitcoin, Says Analyst – Here’s the Timeline - The Daily Hodl
summary: Cardano (ADA) is expected to plunge 70% against Bitcoin (BTC) according to cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin. He predicts that ADA could bottom out at 0.00000400 BTC, or $0.11, a drop of 69.8% from current levels. Benjamin notes that seemingly small gradual losses in altcoins against Bitcoin tend to balloon over time, and gives the example of Chainlink's (LINK) performance against BTC from 2018 to 2022. He advises investors to keep an eye on altcoins that show bullish price action against Bitcoin during a bear market, as they may perform well when altcoins start rallying.

title: Part II: When You Jump Chains, Do NFTs Stay the Same? Ordinals on the Bitcoin Blockchain - JD Supra
summary:
Title: Part II: When You Jump Chains, Do NFTs Stay the Same? Ordinals on the Bitcoin Blockchain

Summary: The article continues to explore the implications of Ordinal NFTs on creators and owners, specifically in regards to the question of whether a copy of an NFT on a different chain (such as Bitcoin) affects the value and licenses of the original NFT. The article discusses how licensing agreements may handle this issue and raises questions about the effect of a new chain on NFT valuation and licensing.

Key points:

1. Ordinals on the Bitcoin blockchain raise questions about the value and licenses of NFTs on different chains.
2. Licensing agreements may recognize NFTs on multiple chains, but the specific terms of each agreement will affect how this is handled.
3. The holder of a copycat Ordinal on Bitcoin may require a license corresponding to the Ethereum NFT, depending on the terms of the licensing agreement.
4. The holder of an Ordinal inscription of an Ethereum NFT may have rights

title: Ethereum Price Prediction - set for a new rally - here's why! - Analytics Insight
summary: Ethereum price is predicted to rally due to positive developments, including the upcoming Shanghai update and the CFTC's consideration of Ethereum as a commodity. Five promising presale coins, including Love Hate Inu, DeeLance, Metropoly, Ecoterra, and RobotEra, are also expected to perform well. These coins offer unique features and potential for growth, making them attractive investment options. Join our community for regular tech updates.

title: Future of Finance: EY’s Brody on why tech history shows ‘there can be only one winning blockchain’ - Fortune
summary: Paul Brody, the global blockchain leader at EY, discusses his career path and how he became interested in blockchain technology. He shares his thoughts on the future of finance and how blockchain will transform networks and enterprises. Brody believes that there can only be one winning blockchain and that Ethereum is the dominant programmable smart contract chain. He explains how embracing blockchain has helped EY from a competitive standpoint and how he sees the technology evolving in the future. Brody also discusses how he applies lessons and ideas from his past projects to his work in blockchain and how he believes blockchain will do for networks and enterprises what ERP did for organizations.

title: Cardano Users Can Soon Access Ethereum Dapps Directly From ADA Wallets - Yahoo Finance
summary: Cardano users will soon be able to access Ethereum smart contracts directly from their ADA wallets through a new feature on Milkomeda, a network that connects blockchains. This will allow developers to build decentralized applications (dApps) on Cardano using the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and Solidity, without the need to install new toolkits or learn a new computer language. This feature will increase the utility of Cardano tokens by allowing users to use them for dApps instead of ether.

title: Ethereum Price Prediction: What To Expect From ETH As The Shanghai Upgrade Nears - Analytics Insight
summary: Ethereum price is consolidating before the Shanghai upgrade, with a possible breakout in either direction. The upgrade will enable the withdrawal of staked Ether, which could reduce risk associated with holding staked ETH and increase buying pressure. The ETH price may not be negatively impacted by the upgrade due to low selling pressure, but it could rise if holders "HODL" their tokens and buy more. The horizontal price movement is supported by flattening moving averages and leveling RSI. A bullish breakout could see the ETH price rise to $2,030, while a bearish breakout could see it drop to $1,653.

title: Bitcoin, ethereum on centralized exchanges at multi-year lows - crypto.news
summary: Bitcoin and ethereum holders are moving their assets from centralized exchanges to self-custody wallets due to distrust caused by the collapse of FTX last year. The amount of these two cryptocurrencies on leading crypto trading platforms has been decreasing and shifting to self-custody, with private keys being moved to cold storage wallets for greater control and security. This trend may indicate a growing need for investors to have complete control over their crypto holdings and provide assurance that they are secure. The recent spat between Binance and the CFTC has accelerated this process, with Binance users withdrawing large amounts of stablecoins from the platform. Despite this, Binance has completed all transactions without incident and reassured users that there is no FUD in the market.

title: Vitalik Buterin Among the Top Speakers at EDCON 2023 In Montenegro - NFTevening.com
summary: Vitalik Buterin is one of the top speakers at EDCON 2023, a major Ethereum and blockchain conference in Podgorica, Montenegro from May 19-23, 2023. The conference features keynote speeches, workshops, and panel discussions on topics like blockchain regulation, layer 3, decentralized society, and more. Other notable speakers include Balaji Srinivasan, Scott Moore, Primavera De Filippi, Tim Beiko, and Cy Li. The event is organized by Linktime, De University of Ethereum, and ETHPlanet, and has attracted a large following since its inception in 2017.

title: Polygon (MATIC) to Drop Secret zkEVM NFTs: Here's How to Get Them - DailyCoin
summary: Polygon (MATIC) is launching a secret NFT collection on its newly launched zkEVM, with holders of a commemorative NFT called "To Ethereum, with Love" being rewarded with an NFT from the new collection. Users have four days left to mint the commemorative NFT and receive the secret NFT. The new NFTs will be transferable, while the commemorative NFTs are non-transferable. Polygon has not shared details on the new NFT collection or when users will access it. Supporting blockchain projects can provide benefits, such as being part of history and potentially receiving rewards.

title: DeFi TVL Bounces Back Even as Active Users Decline in Q1 - The Defiant - DeFi News
summary: DeFi TVL (Total Value Locked) bounced back in Q1 despite a decline in active users, with Ethereum and its Layer 2 ecosystem leading the way. TVL grew by 37% to $83.3B, driven by increasing interest in scaling solutions and the price of ETH. Ethereum now accounts for two-thirds of DeFi TVL, with daily active users growing 55% to 126,000. Layer 2 platforms like Arbitrum, Fantom, and Optimism also saw significant growth, while BNB Chain and Solana saw declines in daily users. NFTs also saw a strong rebound, with trade volume rocketing to $4.7B and total sales increasing by 8.5%. The CryptoPunks NFT collection drove $241M worth of sales, with Yuga Labs' collections representing over a third of total NFT volume.

title: Crypto Price Today Live: Bitcoin holds above $28,000; Solana, Dogecoin slip up to 3% - The Economic Times
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in 256 tokens or less:

Bitcoin is trading above $28,000, but slipped 1.91% in the last 24 hours. Ethereum rose 0.13%. Other major cryptocurrencies like Solana, Dogecoin, and Polkadot saw losses. The global cryptocurrency market cap fell 0.87% to $1.18 trillion. Experts suggest that the current technical outlook for Bitcoin is relatively stable, but a break of the resistance at $28,950 could lead to a potential rally.

title: 'Big Short' Michael Burry Points out Phenomenon Market Has Not Seen Since 1920 - U.Today
summary: Michael Burry, a well-known investor and hedge fund manager, has pointed out that the current market environment is unique in that there has not been a generation as committed to the "Buy the Dip" (BTFD) strategy as the one we are witnessing today. This strategy involves purchasing assets during temporary market declines and has brought significant profits to investors since the 1920s. Burry also acknowledged that he was wrong when he advised his followers to sell in February, and instead, the BTFD strategy has proven to be an efficient way for investors to accumulate assets and ride out market fluctuations.

title: Bybit Launches Optimized ETH Staking Ahead of Ethereum's Shanghai Upgrade - Liberia news The New Dawn Liberia ... - The New Dawn Liberia
summary: Bybit, a top 3 cryptocurrency exchange, launched a new Web3 staking pool for Ethereum (ETH) ahead of the Shanghai upgrade. The pool simplifies the staking process and offers higher APY up to 6.5%. Users can access the pool with BTC, USDT, and USDC balances. Bybit is also hosting two trading events for ETH-related derivatives and predicting price movement, offering a total prize pool of $630,000. The exchange is known for its professional platform, excellent customer service, and multilingual support.

title: India collects over ₹157 crore crypto tax in 2022-23; Ethereum's Shapella upgrade to take place on April 12 - The News Minute
summary: India collected over ₹157 crore in crypto tax in 2022-23, while the Shapella upgrade of Ethereum is scheduled for April 12. Despite a tumultuous year for the cryptocurrency market, Bitcoin's price has recently surged to around $29,000, marking a positive start to the new year.

title: Bitcoin is Top Crypto, Ethereum Best Altcoin, Introducing The No 1 Meme Coin | Bitcoinist.com - Bitcoinist
summary: DigiToads (TOADS) is a new meme coin gaining attention in the crypto market due to its unique features, including NFT staking and P2E gaming. It aims to provide investors with a high-growth token that offers financial gains while offering a fun gaming experience. Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) are currently leading the market, but DigiToads is predicted to have a successful presale in 2023. The token offers exclusive access to unique DigiToads, monthly prize pool payouts, and airdrops to token holders. The community is also actively involved in growing the cryptocurrency.

title: Cardano users to access Ethereum Virtual Machine contracts with any ADA wallet - Cryptopolitan
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in under 256 tokens:

Cardano users can access Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) contracts using any ADA wallet via a new Milkomeda feature. This allows developers to build and deploy dApps and DeFi apps on Cardano without learning a new language or toolkit. Ethereum users can also use Cardano's network without switching blockchains, opening up new development opportunities. Staking rewards for EVM users, including smart contract developers, will be paid out automatically every five days.

title: InfStones launches Ethereum validator service - News Ghana
summary: InfStones launches Ethereum validator service, allowing users to stake ETH and increase computing power with APIs and cloud-based nodes. The service aims to address the heightened market demand for staking on Ethereum after the Shanghai upgrade, which will enable the unstaking of locked assets. However, Ethereum has not yet solved its scalability problem, which may still be a significant barrier. InfStones' platform offers a seamless and secure staking experience, empowering a wider range of participants to join the Ethereum network while fostering increased decentralization. The service is designed to be user-friendly, with a simple one-click setup process and the ability to batch up to 1,000 validators. Additionally, users can stake less than the current minimum of 32 ETH, making it more accessible for participants with less than that amount. The service has already gained significant support from prominent Web3 industry leaders, including Binance, Lido, imToken, and Gate.
